siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Today’s episode kicks off with some follow-up by Stan on what he found to track his time when on his laptop. It seems promising so far. The rest of the episode was sparked by a tweak about advice to new software Developers. Stan replied: “Time management. Work when…

frontmatter.title: Episode 28 - Work When You Work, But Don't Overwork
